head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLD, BERNICE P.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOLD, BERNICE P.

block.p: GOLD-Bernice P. On September 19, 2000. A community leader in Essex County, NJ, serving on the South Orange-Maplewood Board of Education and Chairman of Essex County UJA. She also lectured for Brandeis University. Survived by daughters, Barbara Zingman and Bette Rosen, 7 grandchildren and 12 great-grandchildren.
